MechaMan Smart Glove.name: メカマン・スマートグローブ
MechaMan Smart Glove.description:
A biking glove that comes with a subdermal grip pre-installed* which requires a neural link to use. Has 1 additional cyberarm option slot. Any options stored in the Cyberhand or meat hand are inaccessible while the Smart Glove is being worn.
*Subdermal Grip must be added and installed manually after acquiring the glove, this effectively consumes one of the option slots.

ChipVault by SecSystems.name: ChipVault by SecSystems
ChipVault by SecSystems.description: Can hold up to 8 pieces of Chipware. Chipware stored inside are immune to EMP effects.

CO2 Tank.name: CO2タンク
CO2 Tank.description: A CO2 tank designed for usage with the Masetto AirRider armor. Must be replaced after every usage. Refer to full item description on BC pg. 33.

Drink Master 3000.name: ドリンクマスター 3000
Drink Master 3000.description: Can make 10 beverages out of a 3000 beverages library before needing to be refilled. Can also make Smash. For more information, see Black Chrome Page 42.

EL-F4-NT Linear Frame.name: EL-F4-NT リニア・フレーム
EL-F4-NT Linear Frame.description: Exoskeleton. Increases BODY to 12 while equipped. No changes to your HP or Deathsave. Has pre-installed techtools. (See Black Chrome pg. 55 for more details.)

Everest VentureWare AirWell 50.name: Everest VentureWare AirWell 50
Everest VentureWare AirWell 50.description: Produces enough water to sustain a person.

Everest VentureWare One Touch Habitat.name: Everest VentureWare One Touch Habitat
Everest VentureWare One Touch Habitat.description: Provides protection from Exposure. Counts as Sleeping in the Wilderness or as Sleeping on the Streets.

Fūma Kotarō Linear Frame.name: "風魔小太郎" リニア・フレーム
Fūma Kotarō Linear Frame.description:
Exoskeleton.

  • Requires 2 Interface Plugs
  • Increases BODY to 12 while plugged in
  • Does not affect HP or Deathsave
  • Stealth +2

Comes with two Excellent Quality Exotic Heavy Melee Weapons and one Excellent Quality Exotic Light Melee Weapon pre-installed*.

See Black Chrome pg. 52 for more details.

* Must be manually added.

Hydrosubsidium Universal Aqualung.name: Hydrosubsidium Universal Aqualung
Hydrosubsidium Universal Aqualung.description: When worn, User can breathe underwater as long as within 10 m/yards of the surface.

Jeeves Executive Garment Bag.name: ジーブス・エグゼクティブ・ガーメントバッグ
Jeeves Executive Garment Bag.description: Bag that can repair one piece of fashion or armor at a time. For more information, see Black Chrome Page 43.

KillStrom Banshee Microphone.name: KillStrom Banshee Microphone
KillStrom Banshee Microphone.description: Wireless Microphone Headset. Gives the User a +2 bonus to Play Instrument (Singing) Skill Checks while worn. Doesn't stack with other bonuses to Play Instrument.

KillStrom Sonic Boom Amp.name: KillStrom Sonic Boom Amp
KillStrom Sonic Boom Amp.description: While linked to an instrument, the User can take an Action to make everyone nearby make a Resist Torture/Drugs Check.

KillStrom Typhoid Speaker.name: KillStrom Typhoid Speaker
KillStrom Typhoid Speaker.description: When linked to a KillStrom Sonic Boom Amp, increases the DV of the Resist Torture/Drugs Check.

KTech Doberman 500.name: KTech Doberman 500
KTech Doberman 500.description: Canine Personal Drone that can be linked to an Agent.

Laser Light Electric Guitar.name: レーザー・ライト・エレキギター
Laser Light Electric Guitar.description: Electric Guitar that gives the User a +1 to their Play Instrument (Guitar) Skill Check. This guitar also counts as one installation of Light Tattoo Fashionware while worn. For more information, see Black Chrome Page 41.

LF-001 SWAT Linear Frame.name: LF-001 SWAT リニア・フレーム
LF-001 SWAT Linear Frame.description: Exoskeleton. Requires 2 Interface Plugs. Increases BODY to 12 while plugged in. No changes to your HP or Deathsave. Ignores the normal movement penalty for climbing and swimming. (See Black Chrome pg. 53 for more details.)

Mr. Biscuit Multi-Food Processor.name: Mr. ビスケット・マルチフード・プロセッサ
Mr. Biscuit Multi-Food Processor.description: Can sustain a group of up to 10 people when in the Outskirts. For more information, see Black Chrome Page 49.

Petrochem Nitro Ultra9.name: Petrochem Nitro Ultra9
Petrochem Nitro Ultra9.description: Can be poured into a Vehicle's tank to refill it as an Action. Gives bonuses to movement at the expense of safety.

RapiDeploy Sheath.name: ラピッディプロイ・シース
RapiDeploy Sheath.description: Gives the User a +2 bonus to their Conceal/Reveal Skill Check if used to conceal a weapon already capable of concealement. For more information, see Black Chrome Page 47.

Shower•in•a•Can.name: シャワー・イン•ア・カン
Shower•in•a•Can.description: Spray Deodorant. Desinfects and deodorize. One use per can. For more information, see Black Chrome Page 38.

SovOil Industrial Lubricant.name: ソヴオイル工業用潤滑剤
SovOil Industrial Lubricant.description: Lubricant in a helpfully sized can. For more information, see Black Chrome Page 56.

SovOil Medical Lubricant.name: ソヴオイル医療用潤滑剤
SovOil Medical Lubricant.description: Lubricant in a helpfully sized can. For more information, see Black Chrome Page 56.

SovOil Personal Lubricant.name: ソヴオイル個人用潤滑剤
SovOil Personal Lubricant.description: Lubricant in a helpfully sized can. For more information, see Black Chrome Page 56.

Streetcase by SecSystems.name: Streetcase by SecSystems
Streetcase by SecSystems.description: Can carry many easily accessible items that YOU need to stay safe.

Triti-Fizz.name: トライティ＝フィズ
Triti-Fizz.description: North America's favorite soft drink. For more information, see Black Chrome Page 124.

Vermilion Linear Frame.name: ヴァーミリオン・リニア・フレーム
Vermilion Linear Frame.description: Exoskeleton. Requires 2 Interface Plugs. Increases BODY to 12 while plugged in. No changes to your HP or Deathsave.  No movement penalty for jumping. While running your movement is increased by 6m/yds. (See Black Chrome pg. 54 for more details.)

WorldSat Aerial Sphere.name: ワールドサット・エアリアル・スフィアー
WorldSat Aerial Sphere.description: When set up, provides access to a Citinet when within 50 miles of the city or of another set up WorldSat Aerial Sphere that is connected to the Citinet. For more information, see Black Chrome Page 50.

Zetatech Porta-Printer.name: Zetatech Porta-Printer
Zetatech Porta-Printer.description: Miniature Workshop. Allows a Tech to use Upgrade and Fabrication Experstise anywhere as long as they have techtools.
